name: Infinite Tower of Wizard Power
description:
1. You are a wizard
  2. Go to the tower
  3. Seek INFINITE POWER

blast ghosts to grab power-ups to more effectively blast ghosts as you fly higher and higher inside the Infinite Tower of Wizard Power.

CONTROLS

  • MOVE WITH [arrow keys/wsad/left joystick]
  • You can't stop blasting. The blasts are infinite.

FEATURES

  • play until you lose
  • 3 types of enemies that get bigger and faster
  • 2 types of bosses that you will face in increasing numbers
  • a bunch of different shot types like VERTICAL, SCATTER, DIRECTION, RANDOM and many more
  • numerous special upgrades like MISSILE, ENEMIES EXPLODE, BIG EXPLOSIONS, and many more
